Dear *.

I am developing a rest-like architecture for my dissertation. Mobi=
le clients shall communicate back and forth with the server. I wonder if yo=
u could kindly point me out some (academic) papers, articles and patterns/b=
est practices.

In addition I would be interested in material about WADL an=
d a graphical representation of it - I found one paper but that stops short=
 before the interesting part. Did someone here use various UML diagramms to=
 describe their REST.

I would highly appreciate your help.

Kind regards

=
S.W.Schilke

PS: speaking of academic - you might be interested in the CfP =
at www.inc2010.org
